reference: Budd, John W., Jozef Konings, and Matthew J. Slaughter. 2005. Wages and International Rent Sharing in Multinational Firms, Review of Economics and Statistics, vol. 87, no. 1, pp. 73-84.

Bratsberg, Bernt and James F. Ragan Jr. 2002. Changes in the Union Wage Premium by Industry, Industrial and LaborRelations Review, vol. 56, no. 1, pp. 65-83.
Arulampalam, Wiji, Michael P. Devereux, and Giorgia Maffini. 2007. The Direct Incidence of Corporate Income Tax on Wages, Working Paper 07/07, Oxford University Centre for Business Taxation, July.
Blanchflower, David G., Andrew J. Oswald and Peter Sanfey. 1996. Wages, Profits, and RentSharing,  Quarterly Journal of Economics, vol. iii, no. 1, pp. 227-251.
Anand, Bharat N. and Richard Sansing. 2000. The Weighting Game: Formula Apportionment as an Instrument of Public Policy, National Tax Journal, vol. 53, no. 2, pp. 183-200.

Abowd, John M. and Thomas Lemieux. 1993. The Effects of Product Market Competition on Collective Bargaining Agreements: The Case of Foreign Competition in Canada, Quarterly Journal of Economics, vol. 108, no. 4, pp. 983-1014.
